block.p: BASEBALL
COMMISSIONER'S OFFICE--Suspended Philadelphia minor league SS Hector Made 50 games for testing positive for a performance-enhancing substance.
American League BALTIMORE ORIOLES--Placed RHP Jaret Wright on the 15-day DL, retroactive to April 11. Recalled LHP Brian Burres from Norfolk (IL).

National League CINCINNATI REDS--Placed SS Alex Gonzalez on the bereavement list. SAN DIEGO PADRES--Placed C Josh Bard on the 15-day DL. Purchased the contract of C Pete Laforest from Portland (PCL). WASHINGTON NATIONALS--Placed LHP Ray King on the 15-day DL. Recalled RHP Saul Rivera from Columbus (IL).
FOOTBALL
N.F.L. HOUSTON TEXANS--Signed WR Andre Davis.
HOCKEY

N.H.L. DETROIT RED WINGS--Signed F Jan Mursak to a three-year contract. OTTAWA SENATORS--Signed D Derek A. Smith to a two-year contract. VANCOUVER CANUCKS--Recalled F Jannik Hansen and F Nathan Smith from from Manitoba (AHL).
American Hockey League PROVIDENCE BRUINS--Announced Boston (NHL) has assigned LW Chris Collins to the team from Long Beach (ECHL).

ECHL ECHL--Suspended Alaska LW Hans Benson one game for his actions in an April 10 game, Idaho RW Lance Galbraith one game and fined him an undisclosed amount for his actions in an April 11 game and Columbia D Justin Sawyer three games and fined him an undisclosed amount for his actions in an April 7 game. PHOENIX ROADRUNNERS--Announced C Cam Paddock has been returned from loan to San Antonio (AHL).
United Hockey League QUAD CITY MALLARDS--Added D Chris Mann and F Travis Granbois to the postseason roster.
SOCCER
Major League Soccer CHIVAS USA--Signed F Laurent Merlin to a developmental contract. KANSAS CITY WIZARDS--Signed M Carlos Marinelli.
COLLEGE

DEPAUL--Announced sophomore F Wilson Chandler will make himself available for the NBA draft. DUQUESNE--Named Suzie McConnell Serio women's basketball coach. GEORGIA STATE--Named Dan Reeves consultant for a study about starting a football program. MANHATTANVILLE--Named Elizabeth Ching-Bush women's volleyball coach. MISSOURI-KANSAS CITY--Named Matt Brown men's basketball coach. NORTH CAROLINA A&T--Named Lyndsay Schmiedel interim volleyball coach. OREGON STATE--Announced junior F Marcel Jones will make himself available for the NBA draft. WEST VIRGINIA--Named Erik Martin men's assistant basketball coach.
